title: HELP
body: Hello, I want to tell you about my predicament. A few months ago when North America, Oceania, the transfer was free, my friend decided to take revenge and went through my account, I live in Europe, ie. (Eu West) appealed for help but can help me .. riots again please help me my account myself a fairly large amount of money to a Europe which means I do not have a desire to help those who read and you have a grateful      sorry for bad english.. i have so much lags  and cant move in game .. i really  want to play .. please  People help me

replies.body: Have you tried changing the batteries?

Let me get it right...

1) Your friend "hacked" your account
2) Moved it from NA to OCE Server
3) You wish to move back to NA server because of lag
4) You don't want to pay for it

1) yes ! 
2)  i creat acc  4season ago in na server  but .. i am live Eu and want to tranfer eu. 
3) yeah i wish go EU server !  
4) yes i dont want to pay couse in my Country $ so  hight (very)  i really need oceania  players help !!
